feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - Multiple hosts migration notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 1, 20:00 UTC  -  Apr 2, 05:00 UTC

Jan 13, 21:30 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer, affecting hosts in racks 31A12, 31A13, 31A14 and 31A15.

Start time : 01/04/2026 20:00 UTC
End time : 02/04/2026 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Hosts located in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for 8 hours maximum.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will migrate Hosted Private Cloud hosts in the specified racks from RBX2 datacenter to RBX7 datacenter.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R820L23 Incident Notification
entry.content:
Jan 13, 13:30 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud has been resolved.

Start time : 13/01/2026 08:13 UTC
End time : 13/01/2026 13:00 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 13, 08:54 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack R820L23 in RBX8.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 13/01/2026 08:13 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 13, 08:52 UTC
Update - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack R820L23 in RBX8.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 13/01/2026 08:13 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 13, 08:48 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Managed vSphere offer in the specific rack R820L23.

Start time : 13/01/2026 08:13 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
